privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
This Privacy Policy describes how your information is collected, used, and shared when you use AI-Do ('we', 'our', or 'us').

1. Information We Collect
We may collect the following types of information:
- Account Information: Your name, email address, and profile photo.
- Usage Data: Statistics and data on how you use the app.
- Device Information: Device model, OS version, and unique device identifiers.

2. How We Use Your Information
We use the information we collect to:
- Provide and maintain our services.
- Manage your account.
- Send you notifications and updates.
- Improve and analyze our application.

3. Data Security
We implement industry-standard security measures to ensure the safety of your data. However, please note that no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

4. Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.content:
Welcome to AI-Do. By using our application, you agree to the following terms.

1. Account Usage
You are responsible for the security of your account and all activities that occur under it. You must keep your password confidential and notify us of any unauthorized access.

2. Usage Rules
You may not use the application for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You may not interfere with or disrupt the service or servers.

3. Intellectual Property
The application and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by AI-Do and are protected by copyright laws.

4. Termination
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account without prior notice if you violate our terms.

5. Changes
We reserve the right to update these terms from time to time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

about.title: About App
about.description: AI-Do is an AI-powered smart task management and productivity assistant. It helps you optimize your daily plans, stay focused, and achieve your goals.

questions.q: How can I sync my tasks?
questions.a: Your tasks are automatically synced with our cloud servers when you have an internet connection. Pull down on the home screen to refresh manually.

questions.q: How can I turn off notifications?
questions.a: You can manage your notification preferences from Profile > Settings > Notifications.
Yes, you can request account deletion via our support team or the 'Delete Account' option in Profile settings (if available).
Premium membership gives you unlimited AI suggestions, advanced statistics, and an ad-free experience.
